price: যে ‘আজি যাতে তাত তোমালোকৰ ওচৰলৈ কোনো দুখীয়া-অভাৱী প্ৰৱেশ কৰিব নোৱাৰে’।
arabic: أَن لَّا يَدۡخُلَنَّهَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّسۡكِينٞ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: an lā yadkhulannahā al-yawma ʿalaykum mis'kīnun
